channel.title: A few questinos that really need to be answered
channel.description:
Alright guys I have a few quick (maybe not so quick questions)
Q1: How can I encrypt my client so that other people can't rip it, but they can sitll play it?
Q2: How can I add world maps to places like Ardougne and the Gnome village, and where do I get them from?
Q3: How can I clip firemaking? Its driving me crazy....
Any help would be really appreciated, should I post this in the client help section instead?
Thanks,
